version_description:
We greatly improved our acoustic note recognition engine so you’ll have a better experience on iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 Plus.

New spooktacular Halloween special! Play fun songs like Thriller, The Addams Family Theme, Ghostbusters, Toccata & Fugue and more.

New Lead Sheet II course recently added to the growing courses, making it a total of 21 courses.

We also fixed some annoying bugs.

Keep your feedback and suggestions coming, write us at hello@joytunes.com anytime.

We greatly improved our acoustic note recognition engine so you’ll have a better experience on iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 Plus.

New spooktacular Halloween special! Play fun songs like Thriller, The Addams Family Theme, Ghostbusters, Toccata & Fugue and more.

New Lead Sheet II course recently added to the growing courses, making it a total of 21 courses.

We also fixed some annoying bugs.

Keep your feedback and suggestions coming, write us at hello@joytunes.com anytime.

New Taste of Bach I course recently added to the growing courses, making it a total of 22 courses. Just in case you wanted to know, in Bingo, 22 is referred to as "two little ducks" (quacking optional).

New spooktacular Halloween special! Play fun songs like Thriller, The Addams Family Theme, Ghostbusters,Toccata & Fugue and more.

We also fixed some annoying bugs.

Keep your feedback and suggestions coming, write us at hello@joytunes.com anytime.

NEW update with optimization for iPhone X. We customized the design and made other fixes and improvements to support the all-new iPhone X.

Have any questions, feedback or suggestions? Reach out to us at hello@joytunes.com and one of our friendly bunch will get back to you.

NEW update with optimization for iPhone X. We customized the design and made other fixes and improvements to support the all-new iPhone X.

Have any questions, feedback or suggestions? Reach out to us at hello@joytunes.com and one of our friendly bunch will get back to you.

NEW update with optimization for iPhone X. We customized the design and made other fixes and improvements to support the all-new iPhone X.

For those of you that have experienced the app unexpectedly restarting, make sure to update your device to iOS 11.2 to solve this issue.

Have any questions, feedback or suggestions? Reach out to us at hello@joytunes.com and one of our friendly bunch will get back to you.

Music and holidays go together like running shoes and earphones. That’s why our musicians have created a brand new holiday special!

Learn and play tons of fun festive songs that will get you in the mood to wear your holiday sweater. Play fun songs like All I Want For Christmas, Frosty The Snowman, Last Christmas and more. And, there's snow!

For those of you that have experienced the app unexpectedly restarting, make sure to update your device to iOS 11.2 to solve this issue.

Keep sending us your feedback to hello@joytunes.com

Playing the piano has never been easier! Our superhero developers heard your requests and added new personalized practice options in courses for easy learning. Now you can slow down songs to choose your own pace so you nail it.

New Chord Styling III course added to the growing courses, making it a total of 24 courses.

Keep sending us your feedback to hello@joytunes.com

Playing the piano has never been easier! Our superhero developers heard your requests and added new personalized practice options in courses for easy learning. Now you can slow down songs to choose your own pace so you nail it.

New Chord Styling III course added to the growing courses, making it a total of 24 courses.

Keep sending us your feedback to hello@joytunes.com

Now it’s easier than ever to achieve your goal of playing piano! This cool new update introduces NEW Star Levels - fun practice levels within courses to reinforce the skills you’re learning so you succeed.

Thanks to all your awesome feedback, we’ve changed the background color in Practice Mode so it’s not gloomy anymore. Now you know why you feel happier:)

We also fixed a few annoying bugs:
- Very occasionally the app would crash for a few of you when you login or logout. That is clearly not meant to happen, so we squashed that bug.
- The login link that is emailed to you wasn’t working the way it should on iOS 11. It’s working again now, sorry about that.

Oh, and we’ve added tons more songs to the Song Library for you to enjoy!

We want to make it as easy as possible for you to achieve your goal of playing piano, so we’ve added the ability for you to set your own practice reminders!

Choose the time and frequency you want to practice and you can even add your personal reminder to your calendar. Life can get busy, so we’ll help keep you on track!

We’ve also fixed a few pesky bugs, sorry about those.

As always, if you have any questions or suggestions, reach out to us at hello@joytunes.com

We want to make it as easy as possible for you to achieve your goal of playing piano, so we’ve added the ability for you to set your own practice reminders!

Choose the time and frequency you want to practice and you can even add your personal reminder to your calendar. Life can get busy, so we’ll help keep you on track!

We’ve also fixed a few pesky bugs, sorry about those.

As always, if you have any questions or suggestions, reach out to us at hello@joytunes.com

5.3.2 - An app is like a car - every so often it needs under-the-hood fixes so it runs smoothly. We’ve made a bunch of fixes to create an even more dependable experience.

5.3
Now it’s easier than ever to play piano! This cool update introduces new WARMUPS.

Start your practice session with a warmup so you truly master what you’re learning. A bit like preparing your body and mind before a workout, it’s recommended to warm up your piano muscles so you’ll have an awesome practice session. Warmups are tailored to your level and progress so you nail it. Yay.

You’ll also notice that when you tap the restart button while learning songs in courses, it will take you to the section you need to practice and not back to the beginning. Hurray! Big thanks to our talented developers who made this happen.

Keep the feedback coming, you're all awesome. Write us at hello@joytunes.com

5.2.2:
We fixed a bug that happened occasionally to a few of you when you entered and exited levels, which caused the screen to look a little strange and sometimes the app would crash. That is clearly not meant to happen so we squashed that bug.

5.2:
We want to make it as easy as possible for you to achieve your goal of playing piano, so we’ve added the ability for you to set your own practice reminders!

Choose the time and frequency you want to practice and you can even add your personal reminder to your calendar. Life can get busy, so we’ll help keep you on track!

We’ve also fixed a few pesky bugs, sorry about those.

As always, if you have any questions or suggestions, reach out to us at hello@joytunes.com

This major update is all about making it as easy as possible for you to achieve your goal of playing piano.

Introducing new learning paths to guide you step-by-step, tailored to your individual tastes and goals. Choose between the “Soloist Path”, everything you need to learn so you’ll be playing your favorite songs and pieces, or the “Chords Path”, so you can learn how to accompany any song.

Chords courses have been restructured for an improved learning curve. Don’t worry, your previous progress and course completion will automatically be updated to the new learning paths.

We’ve also introduced new learning milestones so you’ll see what skills you’ll achieve as you progress on your path to learning piano.

It’s our biggest version to date, we hope you’ll like it. Let us know what you think by writing to hello@joytunes.com

6.0:
This major update is all about making it as easy as possible for you to achieve your goal of playing piano.

Introducing new learning paths to guide you step-by-step, tailored to your individual tastes and goals. Choose between the “Soloist Path”, everything you need to learn so you’ll be playing your favorite songs and pieces, or the “Chords Path”, so you can learn how to accompany any song.

Chords courses have been restructured for an improved learning curve. Don’t worry, your previous progress and course completion will automatically be updated to the new learning paths.

We’ve also introduced new learning milestones so you’ll see what skills you’ll achieve as you progress on your path to learning piano.

It’s our biggest version to date, we hope you’ll like it. Let us know what you think by writing to hello@joytunes.com

New! Expand your styling options and sound amazing.

All Pop Chords III songs in the course and library have been revamped to include the style patterns from the Chord Styling courses. That's 19 styled up songs. Enjoy :)

We also fixed a few annoying bugs, sorry about that.

Keep your feedback coming. Write us at hello@joytunes.com and one of our friendly bunch will get back to you.

New! The community has spoken. Thanks to all your awesome feedback, we’ve introduced the ability to turn off Practice Mode. We heard that some of you didn’t love being forced into Practice Mode, so now you won’t be if you’ve turned it off. You can find the magic button to disable it in the app settings menu. We’re helpful like that:)

Keep your feedback coming! Write us at hello@joytunes.com and one of our friendly bunch will get back to you.

Now it’s easier than ever to learn the songs you’ve always wanted to play! Thanks to all your amazing feedback, this cool new update introduces Listen Mode. Having trouble mastering a certain section in a song? Now you can tap the “listen” button to hear how the song should sound.

Our superhero developers also heard your requests to make it easier to find songs in the growing library. Now you can easily search for specific songs or artists using the new shiny search field in the library. Can’t find your favorite song? You can now send us your song requests from the library.

Keep the feedback coming, you're all awesome. Write us at hello@joytunes.com

Just like a piano, the app needed some tuning. We fixed some pesky bugs so it should B sharp now.

Keep your feedback coming! Write us at support@joytunes.com and one of our friendly bunch will get back to you.

Now it’s easier than ever to enjoy learning piano together as a family! This major update introduces the new Family Plan, a new practice option and Siri Shortcuts for easy learning .

Piano for the whole family!
Get up to 5 profiles under one account so each family member can keep track of their individual progress to learn at their own pace.

New practice option!
Based on your feedback, you can now fast forward or rewind in a library song so you can practice a section without having to start over from the beginning. Hurray! Big thanks to our talented developers who made this happen.

This version also integrates Siri Shortcuts so you can play the songs you love with a single tap or voice command. It’s also fully optimized for the new iPad Pro with beautiful edge-to-edge design.

Keep the feedback coming, you're all awesome. Write us at hello@joytunes.com.

Just like a piano, the app needed some tuning. We fixed some pesky bugs so it should B sharp now.

Keep your feedback coming! Write us at hello@joytunes.com and one of our friendly bunch will get back to you.

New! The community has spoken. Thanks to all your awesome feedback, we’ve revamped the metronome sound in Practice Mode so it isn’t so gloomy. Now there’s an accentuated first beat for a more enjoyable Practice Mode. Now you know why you feel happier:)
An app is like a car - every so often it needs under-the-hood fixes so it runs smoothly. We’ve made a bunch of fixes to create an even more dependable experience.

Keep the feedback coming, you're all awesome. Write us at hello@joytunes.com.

Now it’s easier than ever to enjoy learning piano together as a family! This major update introduces the new Family Plan, a new practice option and Siri Shortcuts for easy learning .

Piano for the whole family!
Get up to 5 profiles under one account so each family member can keep track of their individual progress to learn at their own pace.

Major new release making it possible for your entire household to have a personalized piano-learning experience! How’s that to kick off 2020?! With the option of multiple profiles, each family member can learn at their own pace, discover the songs they love and set individual learning goals.

Now it’s easier than ever for your family to fulfill its musical dreams together!

- Set your own learning goals so you know what to focus on each time you sit for practice
- Add up to 5 profiles to keep track of each person’s progress
- Get new songs, released every week, that range from classics to today’s hits
- Dive into our new Pre-Advanced course that was created by popular demand

Also, all of these shiny new features have been optimized for iOS 13!

Exciting NEW feature - choose your own course songs!
With this release, you get to choose which song to end your first piano course with. We’ll give you 6 song options, from different genres, and you can pick your favorite!
If you love Simply Piano and enjoy the learning experience, help us spread the word to other learners like you - by leaving a glowing review - even if you’ve already done so for a previous version of the app.
